# lui-icon

Lite UI supports the following icons.

```html
<lui-icon></lui-icon>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description     | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `name`   | `name`    | The icon name   | `string` | `undefined` |
| `family` | `family`  | The icon family | `string` | `undefined` |
